document.full_text: australian geoff ogilvy withstood strong winds to card a level-par 72 and climb into a seven-way tie for the lead after the second round of the texas open at the tpc san antonio on friday.
document.title: ogilvy in seven-way tie for lead in windy texas
lines_and_colors: australian geoff ogilvy withstood strong winds to card a level-par 72 and climb into a seven-way tie for the lead after the second round of the texas open at the tpc san antonio on friday.
